summary: This mod adds the chainmail armor that people may remember from oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Cyrodiilic Chainmail
Version: 0.5
Date: 12/15/2012
Category: Armour
Author: Croc

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]This File cannot be used in any way shape or form as content for a paid mod.[/size][/color][/b]

Description
================
This mod contains a set of Chainmail light armor based on the Oblivion armor, that can be forged anywhere under the steel category. REQUIRES STEEL SMITHING PERK

Details
=================
The mod contains
- Cuirass
- Boots
- Gauntlets
- Helmet
- contains both male and female versions
- Beast Races compatability
- light armor
Installation:
===================
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD
1. Place the files in your data files folder
2. activate in your data files from the skyrim launcher.
4. Forge under Steel
5. Adventure!!!

History
===================
12/15/2012- Version .5 Initial Release

Credits
===================
-Bethesda for their excellent product and assets.
-The community for their support
author: Croc
